data.name: Pattom
data.source: Calculated median. Land prices (per cent) used: 16.0, 16.0, 22.0, 22.0, 28.0, 30.0, 30.0 (excluding extreme outliers/distant locations). Apartment prices (per sqft) used: 3,750, 6,200, 6,250, 6,250, 6,470, 6,470, 6,470, 9,808.
data.evidence: 4min travel time to City; High density of core services (20 Schools, 20 Hospitals, 20 Parks, 20 Police); Web search confirms 'very safe' environment and 'Clean public transport'; Conflicting reviews on cleanliness ('spotless' vs 'dirty linen'); 25min commute time to Technopark.

data.name: Sreekaryam
data.source: Land price is consistently listed at 8 lakh per cent across multiple listings. Apartment price is the calculated median of 10 explicit price-per-sqft data points extracted from the search results (range ‚Çπ1,837 - ‚Çπ9,612 per sqft).
data.evidence: 20 Schools/Hospitals/Parks; Travel Times: 10min City, 13min Technopark; Web Search: 'Safe at Night', 'No Water Shortage', 'Clean & Hygienic'; Negative: 'downhill and uphill road'.

data.name: Kuravankonam
data.source: Median calculated directly from multiple price points identified in the search results. Land prices per cent included: 2.02, 5.5, 16, 16, 16, 16, 22 Lakhs. Apartment prices per sqft included: 4316, 4321, 5621, 5747, 5961, 5983, 6000, 10783, 11326 ‚Çπ/sqft.
data.evidence: Travel time to City is 8min; 20 Schools and 20 Hospitals reported; Web search indicates blocked drains/flooding risk 5km from Secretariat; Reviews cite 'high end shopping' and 'classy' character; Technopark commute is 29min.

data.name: Sasthamangalam
data.source: Median calculation derived from 8 explicit land price listings (ranging from 5.5L for agricultural/outskirts to 31.11L for prime/commercial plots) and 10 explicit apartment price listings (ranging from ‚Çπ4,482 to ‚Çπ10,963 per sqft).
data.evidence: 4.5/5 Safety rating, Locality is mostly clean, Drainage issue (drains sealed/tiled over), Travel time: 14min to City / 34min to Technopark, Less than 1 km from Vellayambalam Junction.

data.name: Ambalamukku
data.source: Median calculated from 6 explicit land prices per cent (14, 16, 16, 16, 16, 28 Lakhs). Apartment price per sqft median calculated from 3 verified listings (6,428, 7,530, and 14,375 Rs/sqft) specifically located in Ambalamukku.
data.evidence: 1. Travel times: City (8min), Technopark (27min). 2. Amenity counts: 20 Schools, 20 Hospitals, 20 Parks. 3. Web Search: 'Road Maintenance Issues,' 'debris has become a breeding ground for mosquitos,' and 'Flooding and blocked drains... Major public safety issue.' 4. Reviews mention high-end hotel services ('very close to Kowdiar') and expansion (plot acquired).

data.name: Kesavadasapuram
data.source: Median calculated from 7 direct price-per-cent listings or conversions for residential land/plots in Kesavadasapuram/Ulloor area (data points: 10.27, 11.5, 13.0, 14.0, 14.0, 14.0, 25.0 lakhs). Median apartment price per sqft derived from 8 listings for 2BHK/3BHK/4BHK units (median calculated between ‚Çπ5,961 and ‚Çπ6,182).
data.evidence: Travel time to City: 2min. Hospitals: 20, Schools: 20. Web search reports Flooding and blocked drains (Major public safety issue). Web safety rating: 3.7/5. Reviews mention 'neat and clean' but also 'Parking is a problem' and high bank service failure.

data.name: Jagathy
data.source: Median calculated from 9 land prices explicitly quoted (ranging from 9 lakhs to 40 lakhs per cent). Median apartment price calculated from specific listing rates (‚Çπ5,205, ‚Çπ6,940, and ‚Çπ7,360/sqft).
data.evidence: Flooding confirmed by web search ('Killer River overflowed,' 'blocked drains'); Excellent amenity counts (20 Schools, 20 Hospitals, 20 Parks, 20 Police); Travel time to City (17min) is excellent; Travel time to Technopark (33min) is poor; Highly polarized business reviews (positive for SEA, very negative for Piramal Finance).

data.name: Vazhuthacaud
data.source: Derived median. Residential land prices clustered at 15 lakhs/cent (excluding large commercial plots). Apartment median calculated from multiple quoted/calculated rates per sqft (4,482, 6,942, 7,083, 10,128 Rs/sqft).
data.evidence: Flooding and blocked drains major issue; 20 counts each for Schools, Hospitals, Police, Parks; Travel time 16min to City, 32min to Technopark; Reviews mention 'very neat and clean ATM'.

data.name: Kowdiar
data.source: Median calculated from 9 land listings (conversion of sqft prices and direct per-cent quotes like 17 lakhs/cent, 20 lakhs/cent, and 30 lakhs/cent near prime locations) and 8 apartment price points per sqft (ranging from 6,817 to 11,587 INR/sqft across various luxury projects like Shyla Manor, Malabar Grand Cedar, and Heera High Life).
data.evidence: City travel time is 9min; Amenities count (Schools, Hospitals, Parks, Police) is 20 each; Web search confirms 'Poorly lit Kowdiar rd' and local 'Flooding and blocked drains'; Reviews highlight high 'brand value' and prestige of retail offerings.

data.name: Medical College
data.source: Median land price derived from explicit listings (13, 14, 15 lakhs/cent) in Medical College, Ulloor, and Kumarapuram areas. Apartment price derived from median per sqft calculation based on listed property prices and areas (e.g., ‚Çπ5,739/sqft for high-end properties and ‚Çπ4,418/sqft for 60 Lac apartments) in the vicinity.
data.evidence: Travel time to City: 4min; Hospitals count: 20, described as 'World class'/'most advanced'; Flooding risk verified by 'houses raised on stilts' and 'blocked drains' web search data; Cleanliness is poor based on 'Dirty surrounding' and review feedback ('not clean', 'bed bugs'); Parking is a 'huge issue' (driving 1 km to find a spot).

data.source: Median land price derived from explicit listings (13, 14, 15 lakhs/cent) in Medical College, Ulloor, and Kumarapuram areas. Apartment price derived from median per sqft calculation based on listed property prices and areas (e.g., ‚Çπ5,739/sqft for high-end properties and ‚Çπ4,418/sqft for 60 Lac apartments) in the vicinity.
data.evidence: Travel time to City: 4min; Hospitals count: 20, described as 'World class'/'most advanced'; Flooding risk verified by 'houses raised on stilts' and 'blocked drains' web search data; Cleanliness is poor based on 'Dirty surrounding' and review feedback ('not clean', 'bed bugs'); Parking is a 'huge issue' (driving 1 km to find a spot).

data.name: Statue
data.source: Median derived from 8 calculated land price per cent listings (including adjacent prime areas like Vazhuthacaud). Median apartment price derived from 3 calculated listings for Statue/Pulimoodu.
data.evidence: Travel time to City 13min; Web search states: 'Water availability is limited' and 'Flooding and blocked drains just 5 km'; 20 amenities (Schools, Hospitals, Parks, etc.); Reviews confirm central location ('walkable distance to the famous Padmanabha Swamy Temple'); Web search notes 'Frequent Police Patrolling' and 'Safe at Night'.

data.name: Ulloor
data.source: Land price of 14 lakhs per cent is consistently mentioned across multiple listings for dry land in Ulloor. Apartment price is based on the reported average rate (Rs. 5000 per sq-ft) for the locality.
data.evidence: Travel times: City (6min), Technopark (18min). Amenities: 20 Hospitals, 20 Schools. Web Search: Floods persist, low-lying areas inundated, canals clogged with waste. Reviews: Mention of 'ensuing madness from thr road' and dedicated parking (20 cars).

data.name: Vellayambalam
data.source: Median calculated from 6 valid land price listings (ranging from 5.75 to 23.0 lakhs per cent) and 6 valid apartment price listings (ranging from 5,572 to 13,167 Rs/sqft) extracted from the provided search results for Vellayambalam and adjacent localities.
data.evidence: 20 parks/schools/hospitals; City 14min, Technopark 34min; Web search notes 'Poorly lit Kowdiar rd' and 'Flooding and blocked drains'; Reviews cite 'exceptionally clean' rooms and 'excellent treatment'.

data.name: Enchakkal
data.source: Median derived from six specific land price listings (ranging from 8.0 Lacs/cent to 21.02 Lacs/cent) and six specific built-up area listings (ranging from ‚Çπ7,782/sqft to ‚Çπ10,911/sqft) in Eanchakkal and nearby areas (Pettah/Muttathara).
data.evidence: Reviews mention 'easy transport facility like autos and cabs avilable around' and 'very close to Trivandrum Railway station and Bus Stand'; Travel time to Technopark is 18min; Amenities counts are high (20 Schools, 20 Hospitals, 20 Parks); Web search notes widespread flooding in Trivandrum (LK confirms high susceptibility here).

data.name: Kovalam
data.source: Median calculated from 10 distinct land price listings (ranging from 4.25 lakhs/cent to 16.13 lakhs/cent) and 7 distinct apartment price listings (ranging from 3,662 ‚Çπ/sqft to 4,722 ‚Çπ/sqft).
data.evidence: Travel time to Technopark 29min (low job proximity); 17 Parks and 'very quiet, serene' ambience (high environment); 5 Police posts and 'Safety and Secured' review (high safety); Reviews mention 'persistent, unpleasant odor' and 'unclean rooms' (low cleanliness/drainage); High amenity counts (20 schools, 20 hospitals).

data.name: PMG
data.source: Extracted median from 4 specific land listings (14, 16, 21, 22 lakhs/cent) in the PMG/Kuravankonam area, yielding a median of 18.5. Apartment price is the median of specific per-sqft quotes (7200, 7250, 7500 INR/sqft).
evidence: Women's safety rated 1.5 due to explicit review warnings: 'Ladies never go alone to this shop for your safely' and 'owner's behavior was extremely off-putting as he seemed to shout a lot.'
Healthcare/School Quality rated 4.8 based on high amenity count (20 Hospitals, 20 Schools), indicating top-tier urban access.
Drainage rated 1.5 (very poor) due to web search results: 'No proper maintenance of the drains' and 'drains are completely sealed off and tiled over,' confirming systemic failure.
Proximity is extremely high (4.8): Travel time is 8min to City, placing it immediately next to major city junctions.
Cleanliness and Service perception (4.0) is bolstered by highly positive hotel reviews mentioning 'lavish, clean, and extremely comfortable' accommodation and 'meticulously organized' functions.

data.name: St Andrews Trivandrum
data.source: The search results provide data exclusively for Kazhakootam and Menamkulam, which are proximate and highly correlated markets to St Andrews. The median was calculated from 7 land listings (3.38, 4.57, 10, 11, 15, 18, 18.75 lakhs/cent) and 10 apartment listings (3700, 4279, 4482, 4552, 4615, 4686, 6363, 6452, 9345, 9632 ‚Çπ/sqft) in those proxy areas.
data.evidence: Job proximity is high (Technopark: 10min). Amenity density is excellent (20 Schools, 20 Hospitals, 20 Parks). Travel time to City is long (27min). Drainage is a potential issue (Web search mentions general flooding 5km from Secretariat). Safety is reinforced by 3 Police presence.

data.name: Varkala
data.source: Median calculated from five direct land listing quotes (1.50L, 1.50L, 1.50L, 2.00L, 6.00L per cent). Apartment price is the median of three distinct quoted listing prices (‚Çπ1,923, ‚Çπ2,066, and ‚Çπ4,482 per sqft).
data.evidence: Web search rates Safety 4.2/5 and Green Area 4.4/5. Travel time to Technopark is 24 minutes. Amenities count (Hospitals/Schools/Parks) is 20 each. Locality is described as 'calm and peaceful' and reviews praise specific professional services/clinics.

data.name: Peroorkada
data.source: Median derived from 6 land price points explicitly stated or calculated (8, 12, 12, 14, 15, 16 lakhs/cent). Apartment price is the average of two specific listing rates (‚Çπ5,666/sqft and ‚Çπ6,200/sqft), ignoring one stated low 'average rate' (‚Çπ2,250/sqft) for consistency with specific offers.
data.evidence: Flooding and blocked drains just 5 km from the Secretariat; Travel times: City 12min, Technopark 31min; Amenity Count: 20 Schools, 20 Hospitals, 20 Parks; Reviews state: 'Its quite.. not crowded..'

data.name: Kazhakuttom
data.source: Median calculated from 6 specific land price listings (ranging from 5.8 lakhs/cent to 18.75 lakhs/cent) and 8 apartment price data points (ranging from 3,789 Rs/sqft to 6,400 Rs/sqft).
data.evidence: 6 min travel time to Technopark; Roads dug for Smart City project and flooded after one rain; Hygiene is very poor; 20 Schools and 20 Hospitals counted; Night times are very scary.

methodology: EoLI-based weighted scoring: QoL 55%, Economic 20%, Sustainability 25%
